title: K-Pop Group NewJeans Faces New Uncertainty After Member Is Dropped
summary: The band’s label said it had dropped one of the girl group’s five members. NewJeans’s legal battle has drawn public scrutiny of the K-pop industry..
author: Jin Yu Young

title: Amid BTS Jungkook dating rumours, aespa's Winter celebrates her birthday; posts 'red heart' photos on Instagram
summary: aespa's Winter rang in the new year - and her birthday - with a series of intimate Instagram posts that quickly set social media buzzing. Born in 2001, the K-pop star turned 25 on January 1, sharing moments that felt celebratory, personal, and quietly confident, even as old dating rumours involving BTS' Jungkook resurfaced online...
author: Karen Noronha

title: Did They Go Too Far? Cortis Slammed for Talking About Kissing and Dating on Live Broadcast
summary: Rookie K-pop boy group Cortis faces backlash after members discussed romance and kissing during a live stream, prompting their manager to abruptly step in....

summary: On January 6 local time, Billboard revealed that KATSEYE’s hit single “Gabriela” had jumped to a new peak of No. 22 in its 24th week on the Hot 100, which ranks the most popular songs in the United States....
